item.title: The inaugural Tough Mudder event in Asia will take place in Bali, Indonesia
item.description:
Source: Tough Mudder Indonesia. Chairi Ibrahim, Project Manager at Seroja Partners (left), Gandrasta Bangko, Business Director at Mesa Race (middle), and Ridzki Syahputera, Partner at Seroja Partners (right) at the launch ofÂ Tough Mudder Indonesia. The world-renowned endurance series, Tough Mudder, has officially launched in Indonesia. Known as “Probably the Toughest Event on the Planet,” Tough Mudder has attracted 2.5 million participants across 200 events in six countries. Its Asian debut will take place on October 1st and 2nd, 2016, in Bali, Indonesia...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-inaugural-tough-mudder-event-in-asia-will-take-place-in-bali-indonesia/
